mapper.select: SELECT serviceId, roleId, title, description, sliderImage, iconImage, pageName, DATE_FORMAT(registeredDate, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS registeredDate, DATE_FORMAT(modifiedDate, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS modifiedDate FROM oms_service WHERE roleId IN ( SELECT R.roleId FROM oms_role R, oms_member M, oms_role_member_map RM WHERE M.memberId = RM.memberId AND R.roleId = RM.roleId AND M.memberId = #{memberId} )

SELECT serviceId, title, description, sliderImage, iconImage, pageName, DATE_FORMAT(registeredDate, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS registeredDate, DATE_FORMAT(modifiedDate, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS modifiedDate FROM oms_service WHERE serviceId = #{serviceId}
